messages.content: What is the latest version of ComfyUI_Mira as of July 25th, 2024?
The latest version of ComfyUI_Mira as of July 25th, 2024 is version 0.4.3.0.
When was the Text Switcher Two/Three Ways feature added to ComfyUI_Mira?
The Text Switcher Two/Three Ways feature was added to ComfyUI_Mira on July 25th, 2024 in version 0.4.3.0.
When did ComfyUI_Mira start supporting alternative text output for regional condition 2 characters in the Text Switcher?
ComfyUI_Mira started supporting alternative text output for regional condition 2 characters in the Text Switcher on June 7th, 2024 in version 0.4.2.1.
Which components were added in ComfyUI_Mira version 0.4.2.0?
In ComfyUI_Mira version 0.4.2.0, the following components were added: SN74LVC1G125, SN74HC1G86, SN74HC86, NoneToZero, and Create Circle Mask (Test).
When were the Function Swap, Even or Odd List, Bools from List, and Floats from List features added to ComfyUI_Mira?
The Function Swap, Even or Odd List, Bools from List, and Floats from List features were added to ComfyUI_Mira on May 5th, 2024 in version 0.4.1.0.
What major features were introduced in ComfyUI_Mira version 0.4.0.0?
In ComfyUI_Mira version 0.4.0.0, the following major features were introduced: Create Nested Rectangle PNG Mask, Random Nested Layouts, and Integer to Float Multiplication.
When was the initial release of ComfyUI_Mira?
The initial release of ComfyUI_Mira was on February 21st, 2024 as version 0.3.0.0.
What is ComfyUI_Mira?
ComfyUI_Mira is a custom node for ComfyUI that aims to improve various custom nodes to make the workflow more comfortable.
How do you install ComfyUI_Mira?
To install ComfyUI_Mira, you need to clone the repository to the custom_nodes directory in your ComfyUI installation using the command: git clone https://github.com/mirabarukaso/ComfyUI_Mira.git
What is the purpose of the 'Create Tilling PNG Mask' function in ComfyUI_Mira?
The 'Create Tilling PNG Mask' function in ComfyUI_Mira is used to create a tiling PNG image with a Color Mask stack for regional conditioning masks.
What are the inputs required for the 'Create Tilling PNG Mask' function?
The inputs required for the 'Create Tilling PNG Mask' function are: Width, Height, Colum_first, Rows, Colums, and Layout.
What does the 'Text Switcher' node in ComfyUI_Mira do?
The 'Text Switcher' node in ComfyUI_Mira selects between 'text1' or 'text2' based on the 'use_text2' input and automatically adds 'common_text' for the output.
What is the purpose of the 'LoRA Loader With Name Stacker' node in ComfyUI_Mira?
The 'LoRA Loader With Name Stacker' node in ComfyUI_Mira is a simple LoRA loader that includes a name stacker for websites that cannot identify all LoRA information from an image.
What are the outputs of the 'LoRA Loader With Name Stacker' node?
The outputs of the 'LoRA Loader With Name Stacker' node are: MODEL, CLIP, and lora_stack (a new STRING array with current LoRA name and strength information).
